topic.title: Windows 7 x64
topic.body: Where can I get a clean x64 windows 7 image?

1572813299_1GJahzjcad43Dq8GUGwqN5xBZX5Gq.body:
> [mg0](#comment_146_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): Windows 7 Ultimate N SP1 X64 taken from isolinks - ZeroNet

The file isn't available anymore

> [mg0](#comment_147_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): oh well, have you tried with a torrent?

I was able to find a torrent, but it's x86 which only supports up to 4gib of ram and I have no idea if it's safe or not.
https://archive.org/details/ultimategb1cfreendvd6956

> [jetten](#comment_32_195oGGXB8AhwWSoXFHpbVT4TL4wLi1Af5e): Check https://digitalrivermirror.com/ [...]

WINRAR!1! I'll check it with some antivirus software once it downloads

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_945_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): on Linux.

If freeCAD works well for me, I'll probably reinstall linux.

Kaspersky only comes up with a program called WindowsLoader.exe on https://archive.org/details/ultimategb1cfreendvd6956. WindowsLoader.exe is a program that is supposed to activate Windows for free, but it might be malware.

> [merithtk](#comment_54_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKzqW6F8): I dont think he wants activated, i think he just wants a copy of windowshttps://mega.nz/#!Xwx1hbiJ!vTn5KitIq1pH80n0sXMUEh4s5n8vbQ31ro8iOng-xYs [...]

I'm just checking some previously posted images to prevent people from wasting their time on downloading malware.

1572903433_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body: I failed nnn, but yes. It helps with productivity for me.

1572864835_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body:
I think it would be a better idea to just create a custom access point not use piratebox as it's now abandonware.
https://forum.piratebox.cc/read.php?9,23070
Good luck with the project
